meanings.definition: The hair that grows on a man's chin and cheeks.
meanings.sent1: His beard was long and gray.
meanings.sent2: He decided to shave off his beard for a fresh look.
meanings.sent3: The little boy tried to stick fake beard made of cotton balls on his face.
meanings.sent4: The beard of the mountain was covered in thick fog.
meanings.sent5: The wizard's beard flowed in the wind as he cast his spell.

meanings.sent1: She had to beard the angry boss to ask for a raise.
meanings.sent2: The knight was ready to beard the dragon in its lair.
meanings.sent3: The mouse decided to beard the cat in a game of chase.
meanings.sent4: He had to beard his fear and speak up in front of the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The detective needed to beard the suspect to get the truth.

meanings.definition: A tuft of hair on certain animals.
meanings.sent1: The lion's beard made it look majestic.
meanings.sent2: The goat had a thick beard under its chin.
meanings.sent3: The fluffy beard of the rabbit was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The horse's beard swayed as it galloped across the field.
meanings.sent5: The walrus's beard helped it navigate through the icy waters.
